backend/main.mo: Defines investment plans, AI insights, and lead types, initializes default data, and stores them in maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a wallet balance update requirement to the frontend WalletPage file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry template setting metadata, fonts, favicon, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon featuring a geometric red-on-black hexagonal logo with central accents.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that imports global styles and renders the AppRouter.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog managing Internet Identity login with loading, success, and error states and automatic navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard header showing branding and a sign-out button that clears identity and cache.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Section fetching AI insights and displaying them with impact styling, loading skeletons, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Renders a performance analytics preview with animated metrics, sample chart data, and a disclaimer. Displays metric cards and a portfolio performance card.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Implements a contact form with validation, lead submission, and optional lead viewing. Handles input state, errors, and submission feedback.
Displays a list of FAQs in an accordion format. Each question expands to show detailed answers.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Shows a grid of feature cards describing AI and security capabilities. Each card includes an icon, title, description, and badge.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Renders the hero banner with background imagery, headings, CTAs, and quick stats. Includes a sign‑in trigger and smooth-scroll link.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Fetches and displays investment plans with risk badges, selection logic, related-plan filtering, and loading/error states. Allows switching between all plans and related plans.
Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a disclaimer, using smooth scroll for section navigation.
Implements a responsive site header with navigation, mobile menu, and actions for scrolling, opening the dashboard, and triggering sign‑in.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Fetches AI insights from the backend actor using a react-query query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Retrieves investment plans from the backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches lead entries from the backend actor, optionally enabled based on a flag.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Submits lead information via the backend actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Handles fetching and saving the caller’s user profile through react-query mutations and queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color variables, dark mode themes, utilities, and global UI effects like smooth scrolling and accessibility focus.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstrap file that renders the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the authenticated dashboard with a welcome message, stats grid, and quick actions, using user profile and navigation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the public landing page sections and passes sign‑in and dashboard navigation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays wallet balance, actions, and transaction history, with balance determined by the user's principal and navigation controls.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Implements hash‑based routing between landing, dashboard, and wallet pages with protected routes and a sign‑in dialog.
frontend/src/router/ProtectedDashboardRo: Guards dashboard routes by checking Internet Identity auth, showing loading or sign‑in prompts when needed.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Provides a simple hash‑based router hook with route state and a navigate function.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query strings and hash‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, listing existing features and pending requests for updating pricing ranges, percentage values, and a user balance display. Contains metadata about versioning, issues, and project settings.
